document_title: Precocious puberty: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
In addition to signs of changes in the body, children with precocious puberty will often be prescribed a number of medical procedures by the doctor to accurately diagnose this condition such as:
Stomach supersonic;; Uterine ultrasound;; Ovarian ultrasound;; Endocrine blood test;; Thyroid test;; Magnetic resonance imaging MRI;; X-ray of the bones of the hand.
subsection_title: day thi som.json. Diagnosis of precocious puberty
